title: Translation of "radiate" into Spanish
description: Check 'radiate' translations into Spanish. Look through examples of radiate translation in sentences, listen to pronunciation and learn grammar.
cleaned_text: Translation of "radiate" into Spanish irradiar, radiar, brillar are the top translations of "radiate" into Spanish. Sample translated sentence: You are a magical being who radiates with light. Usted es un ser mágico que irradia luz.
